entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
